spatial_accuracy.notes: Critical failures in spatial logic. The 3D render represents a mirrored or heavily modified version of the plan where the Bed-2 and Kitchen/Utility locations are fundamentally altered. Window and door placements do not correspond to the source CAD.

structural_fidelity.notes: The utility room and separate kitchen boundary walls are missing. The primary entrance foyer configuration is ignored. Missing secondary deck to the right of TOI-1.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is used as generic placeholders rather than architectural matches. The scale of the dining table relative to the living area is skewed.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good lighting and material soft-shadows. Isometric camera projection is consistent, though the geometry does not represent the provided blueprint structure.

detected_errors.description: Missing larger deck/balcony structure shown at the top of the plan.
The kitchen and utility area (bottom left in plan) are incorrectly merged or replaced with a bedroom-like setting in the render.
The toilet (TOI-1) is misplaced and lacks proper wall enclosure relative to the adjacent bedroom.
Living and Dining room proportions are squashed compared to the long rectangular layout defined in the plan.
Hallucinated exterior windows on the bottom-most wall where the entrance and utility should be.
